verses.text: \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w speaketh|strong="G3004"\w* \w expressly|strong="G4490"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w latter|strong="G5306"\w* \w times|strong="G2540"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* shall depart \w from|strong="G0868"\w* the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, giving heed \w to|strong="G4337"\w* \w seducing|strong="G4108"\w* \w spirits|strong="G4151"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w doctrines|strong="G1319"\w* of \w devils|strong="G1140"\w*;

Speaking \w lies|strong="G5573"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w hypocrisy|strong="G5272"\w*; \w having|strong="G2743"\w* \w their|strong="G2398"\w* \w conscience|strong="G4893"\w* seared with a hot \w iron|strong="G2743"\w*;

\w Forbidding|strong="G2967"\w* to \w marry|strong="G1060"\w*, \add and commanding\add* to abstain \w from|strong="G0567"\w* \w meats|strong="G1033"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w created|strong="G2936"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* be \w received|strong="G3336"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w thanksgiving|strong="G2169"\w* of them which \w believe|strong="G4103"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w know|strong="G1921"\w* the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w creature|strong="G2938"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \add is\add* \w good|strong="G2570"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w* to be \w refused|strong="G0579"\w*, if it be \w received|strong="G2983"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w thanksgiving|strong="G2169"\w*:
\w For|strong="G1063"\w* it is \w sanctified|strong="G0037"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w prayer|strong="G1783"\w*.

If thou \w put|strong="G5294"\w* the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* in remembrance \w of|strong="G5294"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w*, thou shalt \w be|strong="G2071"\w* a \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w minister|strong="G1249"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, nourished up \w in|strong="G1789"\w* the \w words|strong="G3056"\w* of \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w doctrine|strong="G1319"\w*, \w whereunto|strong="G3739"\w* thou hast \w attained|strong="G3877"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w refuse|strong="G3868"\w* \w profane|strong="G0952"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* old \w wivesâ€™|strong="G1126"\w* \w fables|strong="G3454"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w exercise|strong="G1128"\w* \w thyself|strong="G4572"\w* \add rather\add* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w godliness|strong="G2150"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w bodily|strong="G4984"\w* \w exercise|strong="G1129"\w* \w profiteth|strong="G5624"\w* \w little|strong="G3641"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w godliness|strong="G2150"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w profitable|strong="G5624"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w*, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w promise|strong="G1860"\w* of the \w life|strong="G2222"\w* that now \w is|strong="G3568"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of that which is to \w come|strong="G3195"\w*.

\w This|strong="G3588"\w* \add is\add* a \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w saying|strong="G3056"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w worthy|strong="G0514"\w* of \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w acceptation|strong="G0594"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w therefore|strong="G5124"\w* \w we|strong="G2872"\w* \w both|strong="G2532"\w* \w labour|strong="G2872"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* suffer \w reproach|strong="G3679"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* we \w trust|strong="G1679"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* the \w living|strong="G2198"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w Saviour|strong="G4990"\w* of \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, \w specially|strong="G3122"\w* of those that \w believe|strong="G4103"\w*.

\w Let|strong="G2706"\w* no \w man|strong="G3367"\w* \w despise|strong="G2706"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w youth|strong="G3503"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* be \w thou|strong="G1096"\w* an \w example|strong="G5179"\w* of the \w believers|strong="G4103"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w conversation|strong="G0391"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w charity|strong="G0026"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w purity|strong="G0047"\w*.
\w Till|strong="G2193"\w* I \w come|strong="G2064"\w*, give \w attendance|strong="G4337"\w* to \w reading|strong="G0320"\w*, to \w exhortation|strong="G3874"\w*, to \w doctrine|strong="G1319"\w*.

\w Neglect|strong="G0272"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* the \w gift|strong="G5486"\w* that is \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* was \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w prophecy|strong="G4394"\w*, \w with|strong="G3326"\w* the laying \w on|strong="G1936"\w* of the \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* of the \w presbytery|strong="G4244"\w*.

Meditate \w upon|strong="G3191"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w*; give thyself \w wholly|strong="G2468"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G5125"\w*; \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w profiting|strong="G4297"\w* \w may|strong="G5600"\w* \w appear|strong="G5318"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*.

Take heed \w unto|strong="G1907"\w* \w thyself|strong="G4572"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* unto the \w doctrine|strong="G1319"\w*; continue \w in|strong="G1961"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* in \w doing|strong="G4160"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* thou \w shalt|strong="G4982"\w* \w both|strong="G2532"\w* \w save|strong="G4982"\w* \w thyself|strong="G4572"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* them that \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* \w thee|strong="G4675"\w*.
